root.name: Cargo Commander
root.description: OverviewPlayers find themselves looking at a cutaway view of a cube-shaped ship that the eponymous Cargo Commander calls home; from this home base, players magnetically draw cargo containers towards them. Gameplay primarily involves drilling through the walls of these containers, jumping between and inside them, and getting 'cargo' - cube-shaped collectibles.This is the first release from new development studio Serious Brew. The game was released for PC and Mac on November 1, 2012 via Steam.System RequirementsPCOS:Windows XP/Vista/7Processor:2 GHz (or 4 GHz for CPUs like Celeron/Duron)Memory:2 GB RAMGraphics:DirectX 9.0c compatible; integrated or very low budget cards may not workDirectXÂ®:9.0cHard Drive:120 MB HD spaceMacOS:Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3Memory:2 GB RAMGraphics:OpenGL 2.0 compatible graphics card, 256 MB video memoryHard Drive:120 MB HD space
